pli-tv-bi-vb-pc11:1.12.1_0: ‘If, in the dark of the night without a lamp, a nun stands or talks alone with a man, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc11:1.2_0: On one occasion a nun who was a pupil of Bhaddā Kāpilānī went to Sāvatthī on some business.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc11:1.3_0: Then, in the dark of the night and without a lamp, that nun stood and talked alone with that man.
